TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An immature cell found circulating in the bloodstream. New blood cells develop from peripheral stem cells.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "peripheral stem cell"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "célula madre periférica"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Célula inmadura que circula en la corriente sanguínea. Las células sanguíneas nuevas se originan en las células madre periféricas.
